name: Deevs (The Old version)
description:
"Attention: This is a prototype of the Deevs video game - old version." But now we are making a new one with a new art style, new story, and very better gameplay! 
And for more information, follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/kogrenstudio

Language: Persian (Because of some issues during making the game, unfortunately, we didn't translate it to English, sorry for that)

Gameplay guide: If you want to skip any dialogue scene, just click Alt+Tab and come back to the game again.  Every time you do it, you skip a dialogue line!

This project Credits: 
Kamran Golshahi - 2d Art, story, female deev voice actor
Sajjad Azarpour - Programmer
Sepehr Khoshnazar - Animator
Hamoon Ghayebi - Composer
Siyavash Shabanpoor - Voice Recording
Milad Shahmoradi - male protagonist voice actor, Kurdish Singing (main menu song)
Ehsan Ghasemi - Gilaki singing (The monk)
